name: Robot cleans the room
description:
Robot cleans the room

Click inside the game window to start playing!

Use WASD to control the cleaning robot.

A and D rotate the robot.

W and S move the robot.

Art, photos, and programming by me using the #flatjam template: https://itch.io/jam/flatgame-annual-2016

FX: Vacuum sounds by dobroide (CC attribution)

Music: SuperWin! by nosoapradio (CC attribution)
